sentences.en: ‘Excellent beer,’ he said, wiping the froth from his mouth.
sentences.cn: “好啤酒。”他擦去嘴边的泡沫说道。

sentences.en: a glass of beer with thick froth on top
sentences.cn: 上面有厚厚一层泡沫的一杯啤酒

sentences.en: A rabid dog may froth at the mouth.
sentences.cn: 疯狗可能嘴边流着白沫.

sentences.en: Animals with rabies often froth at the mouth.
sentences.cn: 患狂犬病的动物常常口吐白沫.

sentences.en: De you think these little trees will put froth before long?
sentences.cn: 你认为这些小树不久就会长出叶 吗 ?

sentences.en: Don't move those flower pots back and froth.
sentences.cn: 你别来回摆弄那几盆花了.

sentences.en: Falling in love the first time is all froth and fantasy.
sentences.cn: 初恋完全是一场虚幻的美梦。

sentences.en: Gelatin, froth or powder suitable greasiness, property and neutral flesh.
sentences.cn: 凝胶 、 泡沫或粉末适合油性 、 混合性及中性肌肤.

sentences.en: I don't like beer with too much froth.
sentences.cn: 我不喜欢泡沫太多的啤酒.

sentences.en: The glass of beer was mostly froth.
sentences.cn: 这杯啤酒大部分是泡沫.

sentences.en: The play was amusing, but it was little more than froth.
sentences.cn: 这出戏还算有趣, 不过内容有些空泛.

sentences.en: The play was little more than froth.
sentences.cn: 这出戏只不过是些浅薄的空谈.

sentences.en: The play was nothing but froth.
sentences.cn: 这出戏只不过是浅薄的表演.

sentences.en: Their chatter was nothing but froth!
sentences.cn: 他们聊天儿没别的,全是废话!

sentences.en: Using tree branches, saw froth to produce high density fiberboard ( HDF ) project.
sentences.cn: 利用树木枝丫 、 锯沫生产高密度纤维板 ( HDF ) 项目.

words.tran_cn: 多泡的；起泡的；空洞的，浅薄的
使起泡沫；以泡沫覆盖；发泄（froth的ing形式）

trans.tran_cn: 泡沫，口边白沫，无关紧要的小事
trans.tran_en: a mass of small  bubbles  on the top of a liquid
if a liquid froths, it produces or contains a lot of small  bubbles  on top
